title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
description: Two panel huipil with square-cut neck opening; randa extends 3/4 of way down center seam; embroidery and/or supplementary weft patterning at shoulders and at center front and back;  red field with warp stripes of blue, yellow, green, purple and brocading; green velvet applied and embroidered at neckline; open at sides; zoomorphic and geometric figures.
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
